explains: n. 相互关系，关联；相关量
wordGroup: correlation coefficient 相关系数；关联系数
correlation method 相关法；对比法
cross correlation 互相关，交互相关
correlation technique 相关技术，相关方法
canonical correlation analysis 典型相关分析；典范相关分析
direct correlation 直接相关；正相关
partial correlation 部份相关，偏相关；部分相关
time correlation 时间相关，时间关联

sentences.en: There is a direct correlation between exposure to sun and skin cancer.
sentences.cn: 皮肤暴露在太阳下与皮肤癌直接相关。

sentences.en: One interesting correlation Manton uncovered is that better-educated people are likely to live longer.
sentences.cn: "曼顿揭示了一个有趣的相关现象：受过良好教育的人可能会更长寿。

sentences.en: There were some apparent exceptions to the general correlation observed between adenosine-receptor binding and stimulation.
sentences.cn: 在腺苷受体结合和刺激之间的一般相关性中，有一些明显的例外。
